fulltext:
CAO LAN PHUONG 
#801, Tower 1, Estella Heights, 
An Phu Ward, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City 
Phone: 0988.919.696  
E-Mail: phuong.clp@gmail.com 
Objectives 
Develop professional leadership career in Marketing. Becoming a long-term, value asset to the 
organisation with creativeness, ambition, unique up-to-date hands-on experience and 
commitment.  
WORKING EXPERIENCES 
NKID CORPORATION 
OCT 2013 – DEC 2018 
Marketing Manager 
Vision, plan and supervise all Online/Offline marketing campaign for over 28 tiNiWorld Centers 
nationwide with a wide range scope of work: 
1. Planning, budgeting and report:  
• 
Forecasted and planed monthly, quarterly, annually Marketing campaign to ensure 
revenue target 
• 
Monitored and analyzed market trend to develop brand strategy   
• 
Developed plan to improve existing customer experiences and increase profitability, 
brand love 
• 
Translated business vision into CSR activities 
• 
Built budget and ensured cost effectiveness across business units 
• 
Worked closely with Technology, Operation and Finance team to develop new 
service/products also strategy to reach monthly business target in parallel with 
increasing customer satisfaction 
• 
Conducted local market research and customer behavior to establish nation/cities 
marketing strategy for every niche market of each center 
2. Digital Communication 
• 
Planed, created and monitored Online Brand Presence and Online 
Roadmap (Social Pages, Website, App..) for Brand Awareness; 
• 
Monitored all digital communications content creation and implementations includes: 
Fanpage, Website, App, Youtube Channels 
• 
Monitored all Digital Communication execution includes: Facebook Ads, PPC, Display 
Ads, SEO, Email MKT, Online PR, O2O 
• 
Managed and performance control of Digital Specialist team in action to generate sales 
of Birthday Party/Group Sales with Affiliate Marketing, SEO, Google Ads; 
• 
Actively led the development of Brand CRM platform includes: NFC Membership Card, 
Prepaid Payment, Customer App, Redemption Program. Improving the usability, UI 
2 
design, content and conversion of the platform; 
3. Events:  
• 
Managed all in-centers, out-centers, opening, launching and annual events 
• 
Developed and implemented In-Center mini events to raise Customer Experience that 
differentiate brands and emphasize brand leader position (Missions, shows, 
performance) 
• 
Conducted entertainment programs. Created tiNi-Band, in-house performance group 
• 
Constantly created new content to deliver Brand story both online and offline (shows, 
videos, comics) 
4. Leadership & Management:  
• 
Guided day to day activities of Marketing team 
• 
Directly led 29 members in 3 in-house teams of: Digital Communication, Event, 
Creative.   
• 
Led and coached team members with specialize course & monthly team sharing 
• 
Monitored Customer Satisfaction, Brand Health and Social Listening  
• 
Analyzed and developed potential strategic partner relationships for brand 
• 
Worked with agency to ensure: vision, budget and KPIs 
• 
Actively contributed to Organization culture program  
JODRIC PTY 
AUG 2013 – OCT 2013 
Business Development Manager 
1. Account Management:  
• 
Proposed Sales & Marketing Solution for client  
• 
Proposed monthly event strategy to client  
• 
Supervised all execution 
• 
Dealt with sponsors and communication partners 
2. Business Development:  
• 
Contacted potential partners 
• 
Closed new business deals by coordinating requirements; developing and negotiating 
contracts; integrating contract requirements with business operations. 
3 
STRUCTON VIETNAM PTY LTD 
DEC 2012 – JUL 2013 
Marketing Manager 
• 
Conducted market research and contributed to marketing campaign planning to 
address new customers/clients; 
• 
Localized company portfolio and corporation campaign 
• 
Contributed intensively in building business development team 
• 
Actively managed company profile and ensure the effectiveness of each project 
proposals; 
• 
Customized capacity data and other administrative tasks for projects. 
• 
Supported in working with foreign project manager 
• 
Actively conducted Client relation retention 
MAGONN DESIGN  
 JUN 2012 – OCT 2012 
Communication & PR Leader  
• 
Supported marketing team for above the line and below the line marketing activities 
such as: fashion event, private sale, magazine photo-shooting, TV talks in facilities 
administration, expenses recording and backstage garments organizing; 
• 
Managed and utilized Magonn E-commerce website includes: customer experience, 
clicks control, products, visual and data mining 
• 
Took photos of products and event photos, retouched and uploaded to website; 
• 
Clarified and diagnosed market response via telephone, Facebook fan page, forums 
and brand’s website. 
KINGCOM MEDIA LTD 
 JAN 2010 – MAY 2011 
Event Coordinator (Part-time) 
• 
Participated in preparing budgets and provided periodic progress reports to Event 
Manager for each event project;  
• 
Proposed new ideas to improve the event planning and implementation process;  
• 
Assisted in negotiations for space contracts and booked event space, arranged food 
and beverage, audiovisual equipment and ensured appropriate décor; 
• 
Monitored setup team before event; record setup expenses; ensure the concept 
execution 
• 
Guided back stage team (Audio and lighting, performer, promotion staff) 
4 
VIETNAM AIRLINES 
NOV 2002 – SEP 2009 
Cabin Attendant  
• 
Led and mentored a team of 7-10 cabin attendants to provide high quality services 
from Economy Class to Business Class; 
• 
Collected and reported about customer’s feedbacks, contributed ideas to enhance 
services; 
• 
Responded and replied to passenger enquiries about company, brand, flights and 
destination; 
• 
Ensured customer relation, professional service and safety of passengers; 
• 
Administered the effectively use of supplies and giving feedback to quality control 
department. 
EDUCATION 
RMIT UNIVERSITY VIETNAM 
          FEB 2010 – JUN 2012 
Bachelor of Commerce 
Highlight courses: Marketing, Market Research, Business Communication, E-commerce, 
Strategic Management and International Management. 
FLIGHT TRAINING CENTER OF VIETNAM                             MAR 2002 – NOV 2002 
Professional Flight Attendant Training Course 
Highlight courses: Professional Customer Service, Professional Customer Relation, First Aid, 
Crew Resources Management, and Flight Safety 
CENTRE OF DIGITAL EXCELLENCE & GOOGLE VIETNAM        DEC 2018 
Google Digital 4.0 Workshop 
SKILLS & QUALIFICATION 
- 
Excellent written and oral communications and negotiation skills; 
- 
Good business sense and highly commitment brand love 
- 
Creative and eager learner of new trend, technology 
- 
Good leadership skills, ability to lead big team 
- 
Flexibility in all working conditions for effective problem solving; 
- 
Deep understand of market, customer behaviour and technology updates 
- 
Good organizing & multi-tasking, able to work under pressure to meet deadlines; 
5 
- 
Good knowledge in Photoshop, Illustrator and Photography 
- 
Computer proficiency in MS Word, Excel, Power Point and Internet access;  
PERSONAL DATA 
Date of Birth: November, 20th 1984 
Hobbies & Interest: Art, technology, reading, music, 
watching Discovery channel and National Geographic 
channel 
Work Availability: Feb 2019 
Personalities: Good sense of humor, trustworthy, self-
motivated and socialized. 
REFERENCES 
1 Họ và tên 
Nguyễn Phương Thảo  
Chức vụ: 
Trưởng phòng C&B 
Công ty 
N KID Corporation 
Điện thoại 
0909.396.781  
Email: 
Thao.nguyenphuong@nkidcorp.com 
2 Họ và tên 
Nguyễn Lê Chi Mai 
Chức vụ: 
Co Founder/ CEO 
Công ty 
N KID Corporation 
Điện thoại 
0916.906.331  
Email: 
Mai.nguyen@nkidcorp.com 
6 
3 Họ và tên 
Lâm Minh Trí 
Chức vụ: 
Creative Director 
Công ty 
Jodric Pty 
Điện thoại 
0913.154.448 
Email: 
z@jodric.com

2. Digital Communication • Planed, created and monitored Online Brand Presence and Online Roadmap (Social Pages, Website, App..) for Brand Awareness; • Monitored all digital communications content creation and implementations includes:
Fanpage, Website, App, Youtube Channels • Monitored all Digital Communication execution includes: Facebook Ads, PPC, Display Ads, SEO, Email MKT, Online PR, O2O • Managed and performance control of Digital Specialist team in action to generate sales of Birthday Party/Group Sales with Affiliate Marketing, SEO, Google Ads; • Actively led the development of Brand CRM platform includes: NFC Membership Card, Prepaid Payment, Customer App, Redemption Program. Improving the usability, UI design, content and conversion of the platform;
